room_title: Escape room "Tomb" by 5 Wits in Albany
review: The Tomb was my favorite! The staff really helped us get into character for the escape room. It was so fun that after the first escape room we insisted on doing all three rooms. I highly recommend spending an afternoon with your friends or family at 5 Wits!

room_title: Escape room "Tomb" by 5 Wits in Albany
review: Just finished entering the Tomb of the Pharaoh with my 9-year-old brother. It really felt like I was in a tomb with Indiana Jones! You think you know what to expect but you go in there and you're always on your toes! We'll be back for another adventure for sure!

room_title: Escape room "Tomb" by 5 Wits in Albany
review: I did the Tomb and Castle adventures with a friend. The adventures were so much fun and werenâ€™t too difficult at all even though it was just the two of us. Would highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Tomb" by 5 Wits in Albany
review: My family and I had a great time! We did all three rooms and even got a perfect score on the Tomb room! Ashley and Dave were great moderators! 10/10 would recommend!
